text: Borka Pavićević (1947 – June 30, 2019) was a Serbian dramaturge, newspaper columnist, and cultural activist. She was a "dramatist, Belgrade liberal and pacifist intellectual". She founded the Centre for Cultural Decontamination in 1994, and was a co-founder of the Belgrade Circle. Pavićević was born in Kotor, Montenegro, Yugoslavia. Pavićević died on June 30, 2019 in Belgrade at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Serbian writers Category:Columnists Category:Activists Category:People from Belgrade
title: Borka Pavićević
